016package io.micronaut.maven.services;
017
018import org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession;
019import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.Log;
020import org.apache.maven.plugin.logging.SystemStreamLog;
021import org.apache.maven.project.DefaultDependencyResolutionRequest;
022import org.apache.maven.project.DependencyResolutionRequest;
023import org.apache.maven.project.DependencyResolutionResult;
024import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
025import org.apache.maven.project.ProjectDependenciesResolver;
026import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.InvocationResult;
027import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.MavenInvocationException;
028import org.eclipse.aether.RepositorySystemSession;
029import org.eclipse.aether.graph.Dependency;
030import org.eclipse.aether.graph.DependencyFilter;
031import org.eclipse.aether.util.filter.DependencyFilterUtils;
032
033import javax.inject.Inject;
034import javax.inject.Singleton;
035import java.io.File;
036import java.util.Collections;
037import java.util.Comparator;
038import java.util.List;
039import java.util.Optional;
040import java.util.stream.Collectors;
041
042/**
043 * Provides methods to compile a Maven project.
044 *
045 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
046 * @since 1.1
047 */
048@Singleton
049public class CompilerService {
050
051    public static final String MAVEN_JAR_PLUGIN = "org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-jar-plugin";
052
053    private static final String COMPILE_GOAL = "compile";
054
055    private final Log log;
056    private final MavenSession mavenSession;
057    private final ExecutorService executorService;
058    private final ProjectDependenciesResolver resolver;
059
060    @SuppressWarnings("MnInjectionPoints")
061    @Inject
062    public CompilerService(MavenSession mavenSession, ExecutorService executorService,
063                           ProjectDependenciesResolver resolver) {
064        this.mavenSession = mavenSession;
065        this.resolver = resolver;
066        this.log = new SystemStreamLog();
067        this.executorService = executorService;
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Compiles the project.
072     * @return the last compilation time millis.
073     */
074    public Optional<Long> compileProject() {
075        Long lastCompilation = null;
076        if (log.isDebugEnabled()) {
077            log.debug("Compiling the project");
078        }
079        try {
080            executorService.invokeGoals(COMPILE_GOAL);
081            lastCompilation = System.currentTimeMillis();
082        } catch (Exception e) {
083            if (log.isErrorEnabled()) {
084                log.error("Error while compiling the project: ", e);
085            }
086        }
087        return Optional.ofNullable(lastCompilation);
088    }
089
090    /**
091     * Resolves project dependencies for the given scopes.
092     *
093     * @param runnableProject the project to resolve dependencies for.
094     * @param scopes the scopes to resolve dependencies for.
095     * @return the list of dependencies.
096     */
097    public List<Dependency> resolveDependencies(MavenProject runnableProject, String... scopes) {
098        try {
099            DependencyFilter filter = DependencyFilterUtils.classpathFilter(scopes);
100            RepositorySystemSession session = mavenSession.getRepositorySession();
101            DependencyResolutionRequest dependencyResolutionRequest = new DefaultDependencyResolutionRequest(runnableProject, session);
102            dependencyResolutionRequest.setResolutionFilter(filter);
103            DependencyResolutionResult result = resolver.resolve(dependencyResolutionRequest);
104            return result.getDependencies();
105        } catch (org.apache.maven.project.DependencyResolutionException e) {
106            if (log.isWarnEnabled()) {
107                log.warn("Error while trying to resolve dependencies for the current project", e);
108            }
109            return Collections.emptyList();
110        }
111    }
112
113    /**
114     * Builds a classpath string for the given dependencies.
115     *
116     * @param dependencies the dependencies to build the classpath for.
117     * @return the classpath string.
118     */
119    public String buildClasspath(List<Dependency> dependencies) {
120        Comparator<Dependency> byGroupId = Comparator.comparing(d -> d.getArtifact().getGroupId());
121        Comparator<Dependency> byArtifactId = Comparator.comparing(d -> d.getArtifact().getArtifactId());
122        return dependencies.stream()
123                .sorted(byGroupId.thenComparing(byArtifactId))
124                .map(dependency -> dependency.getArtifact().getFile().getAbsolutePath())
125                .collect(Collectors.joining(File.pathSeparator));
126    }
127
128    /**
129     * Packages the project by invoking the Jar plugin.
130     *
131     * @return the invocation result.
132     */
133    public InvocationResult packageProject() throws MavenInvocationException {
134        return executorService.invokeGoal(MAVEN_JAR_PLUGIN, "jar");
135    }
136}
